item.title: Fix Flagsmith link
item.description: https://flagsmith.com - Release features with confidence; manage feature flags across web, mobile, and server side applications. Use our hosted API, deploy to your own private cloud, or run on-premise

item.title: add freetools.site
item.description: https://freetools.site/ - Free online tools. Convert or edit documents, images, audio, video and more.

item.title: add androidfilehost
item.description: https://androidfilehost.com/ - Free file sharing platform with unlimited speed, bandwidth, file count, download count, etc. Mainly aimed for Android dev related files like APK build, custom ROM & modifications, etc. But seems to accept any other files as well.

item.title: add hackmd.io markdown file collaboration tool
item.description: https://hackmd.io/pricing - Real time collaboration & writing tool for markdown format docs/files. Like GoogleDocs but for markdown files. Free unlimited number of "notes", but number of collaborators (invitee) for private notes & template [will be limited](https://hackmd.io/pricing).

item.title: add gofile.io free file sharing storage platform
item.description: https://gofile.io/) - Free file sharing and storage platform, can be used via web based UI & also API. unlimited file size, bandwidth, download count, etc. But when a file becomes inactive (no download for more than 10 days - Free file sharing and storage platform, can be used via web based UI & also API. unlimited file size, bandwidth, download count, etc. But when a file becomes inactive (no download for more than 10 days), it will be deleted.

item.title: add cyberchef
item.description: https://gchq.github.io/CyberChef/ - A simple, intuitive web app for analysing and decoding/encoding data without having to deal with complex tools or programming languages. Like a swiss army knife of cryptography & encryption. All features are free to use, no limit. Open source, if you wish to self-host.

item.title: add commandbar
item.description: https://www.commandbar.com/ - Unified Search Bar as-a-service, web based UI widget/plugin that allows your users to search contents, navigations, features, etc. within your product, which helps discoverability. Free for up-to 1000 Monthly Active Users, unlimited commands.

item.title: add proton mail & tutanota
item.description:
https://proton.me/mail - - Free secure email account service provider with built-in end-to-end encryption. Free 1GB storage.
https://github.com/tutao/tutanota - Free secure email account service provider with built-in end-to-end encryption, no ads, no tracking. Free 1GB storage. Which also partially [open source](https://github.com/tutao/tutanota), so you can opt to self-host.

item.title: add Wdrfree SVG
item.description: https://wdrfree.com/free-svg - - Black and White Free SVG Cut files.

item.title: Update README.md
item.description: https://www.3dmodelscc0.com/ - Library of public domain 3D models made for game development.
